trans-unit.source: Provides extension methods for retrieving <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> implementations for the public and private keys of an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" />.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona métodos de extensión para recuperar implementaciones de <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> para las claves públicas y privadas de un <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" />.

trans-unit.source: The RSA certificate.
trans-unit.target: Certificado RSA.

trans-unit.source: The private RSA key.
trans-unit.target: Clave privada de RSA.

trans-unit.source: Combines a private key with the public key of an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> certificate to generate a new RSA certificate.
trans-unit.target: Combina una clave privada con la clave pública de un certificado <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> para generar un nuevo certificado RSA.

trans-unit.source: A new RSA certificate with the <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.HasPrivateKey" /> property set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Nuevo certificado RSA con la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.HasPrivateKey" /> establecida en <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: The input RSA certificate object isn't modified.
trans-unit.target: El objeto de certificado RSA de entrada no se modifica.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificate" /> or <paramref name="privateKey" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor de <paramref name="certificate" /> o <paramref name="privateKey" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The certificate already has an associated private key.
trans-unit.target: El certificado ya tiene asociada una clave privada.

trans-unit.source: The certificate doesn't have a public key.
trans-unit.target: El certificado no tiene ninguna clave pública.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: O bien

trans-unit.source: The specified private key doesn't match the public key for the specified certificate.
trans-unit.target: La clave privada especificada no coincide con la clave pública del certificado especificado.

trans-unit.source: The certificate.
trans-unit.target: Certificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> private key from the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la clave privada <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> a partir de <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" />.

trans-unit.source: The private key, or <see langword="null" /> if the certificate does not have an RSA private key.
trans-unit.target: Clave privada, o <see langword="null" /> si el certificado no tiene una clave privada RSA.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificate" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The certificate.
trans-unit.target: Certificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> public key from the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la clave pública <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> de <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" />.

trans-unit.source: The public key, or <see langword="null" /> if the certificate does not have an RSA public key.
trans-unit.target: Clave pública, o <see langword="null" /> si el certificado no tiene una clave pública RSA.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificate" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Windows reports an error.
trans-unit.target: Windows notifica un error.

trans-unit.source: See the <see cref="P:System.Exception.Message" /> property for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Exception.Message" /> para obtener más información.
